version_description:
To make your experience with the app more convenient, we’ve added new features and fixes for improved performance:
- Set preferences
- Add films to your watchlist
- Social distancing seat layouts
- Push notification messaging enabled

Keep the app updated so you always get the latest and greatest!

Thank you for using AMC Cinemas app!

To make your experience with AMC Cinemas app simpler and faster, we’ve made some performance improvements and bug fixes.

Thank you for using AMC Cinemas app!

To make your experience with AMC Cinemas app simpler and faster, we’ve made some performance improvements and bug fixes.

Keep the app updated so you always get the latest and greatest!

Your App Experience is now smoother with AMC!

You can now purchase your tickets using Apple Pay; we also linked our movie notifications to the showtimes page to ease your ticket booking process!

We've listened to your feedback and introduced several enhancements to improve your experience.

The changes include:
• Added Apple Pay feature for a faster checkout
• Added a feature to save frequently used credit/debit cards for a faster checkout
• Added support for storing the movie tickets booked into your apple wallet
• General enhancements that would improve the booking experience within the app

استمعنا لاقتراحاتكم وجيناكم بالعديد من المميزات لتسهيل تجربتك في تطبيق اي ام سي.

التغييرات تشمل:
ميزة آبل باي لإجراء عملية دفع أسرع
ميزة حفظ بطاقات الائتمان / مدى لإجراء عملية دفع أسرع
ميزة حفظ تذاكر الافلام في محفظة آبل الخاصة بك
تحسينات عامة لتحسين تجربتك للحجز داخل التطبيق

Capping the number of seats booked in a row to 5 at maximum, as per government directive.

بتوجيه من الجهات الحكومية، تم تعديل حجز المقاعد المتسلسلة الى 5 كحد اقصى.
